short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Password sharing done secure, simple, and covert

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PlusPassword is the most secure, simple, and covert way to share passwords with others. 

Secure. Strongest encryption standards and robust security design. Built with security as its number one priority.

Simple. Enter in password to share. Press enter to encrypt. Share generated link. Done, super simple.

Covert. No more sharing and revealing passwords in plaintext. Only allow decrypting and pasting password into password input fields where passwords are masked by default.
